name: Opportunity
description: Represents a sale or pending deal.
summary:
The `Opportunity` object in Salesforce is a standard object used to track sales and pending deals. It contains various attributes to capture details about potential sales opportunities. Here is a summary of the `Opportunity` object with its attributes:

### Key Attributes:

- **Id**: Unique identifier for the opportunity (type: id).
- **IsDeleted**: Indicates if the opportunity is deleted (type: boolean).
- **AccountId**: Reference to the associated account (type: reference).
- **IsPrivate**: Indicates if the opportunity is private (type: boolean).
- **Name**: Name of the opportunity (type: string).
- **Description**: Detailed description of the opportunity (type: textarea).
- **StageName**: Current stage of the opportunity (type: picklist).
- **Amount**: Total amount of the opportunity (type: currency).
- **Probability**: Probability of closing the opportunity (type: percent).
- **ExpectedRevenue**: Expected revenue from the opportunity (type: currency).
- **TotalOpportunityQuantity**: Total quantity of the opportunity (type: double).
- **CloseDate**: Expected close date of the opportunity (type: date).
- **Type**: Type of the opportunity (type: picklist).
- **NextStep**: Next step in the opportunity process (type: string).
- **LeadSource**: Source of the lead (type: picklist).
- **IsClosed**: Indicates if the opportunity is closed (type: boolean).
- **IsWon**: Indicates if the opportunity is won (type: boolean).
- **ForecastCategory**: Forecast category of the opportunity (type: picklist).
- **ForecastCategoryName**: Name of the forecast category (type: picklist).
- **CampaignId**: Reference to the associated campaign (type: reference).
- **HasOpportunityLineItem**: Indicates if the opportunity has line items (type: boolean).
- **Pricebook2Id**: Reference to the associated price book (type: reference).
- **OwnerId**: Reference to the owner of the opportunity (type: reference).
- **CreatedDate**: Date and time when the opportunity was created (type: datetime).
- **CreatedById**: Reference to the user who created the opportunity (type: reference).
- **LastModifiedDate**: Date and time when the opportunity was last modified (type: datetime).
- **LastModifiedById**: Reference to the user who last modified the opportunity (type: reference).
- **SystemModstamp**: System timestamp of the last modification (type: datetime).
- **LastActivityDate**: Date of the last activity on the opportunity (type: date).
- **PushCount**: Number of push notifications (type: int).
- **LastStageChangeDate**: Date and time when the stage was last changed (type: datetime).
- **FiscalQuarter**: Fiscal quarter of the opportunity (type: int).
- **FiscalYear**: Fiscal year of the opportunity (type: int).
- **Fiscal**: Fiscal period of the opportunity (type: string).
- **ContactId**: Reference to the associated contact (type: reference).
- **LastViewedDate**: Date and time when the opportunity was last viewed (type: datetime).
- **LastReferencedDate**: Date and time when the opportunity was last referenced (type: datetime).
- **HasOpenActivity**: Indicates if there are open activities (type: boolean).
- **HasOverdueTask**: Indicates if there are overdue tasks (type: boolean).
- **LastAmountChangedHistoryId**: Reference to the last amount change history (type: reference).
- **LastCloseDateChangedHistoryId**: Reference to the last close date change history (type: reference).
- **DeliveryInstallationStatus__c**: Custom field for delivery/installation status (type: picklist).
- **TrackingNumber__c**: Custom field for tracking number (type: string).
- **OrderNumber__c**: Custom field for order number (type: string).
- **CurrentGenerators__c**: Custom field for current generators (type: string).
- **MainCompetitors__c**: Custom field for main competitors (type: string).

These attributes help in tracking and managing the lifecycle of sales opportunities within Salesforce.
label: Opportunity
